mapper.select: SELECT er.result_id AS resultId, e1.emp_no AS evalNo, e1.name AS evalName, e2.emp_no AS targetNo, e2.name AS targetName, ef.name AS formName, r.round_no AS roundNo, er.score AS score, er.reason AS reason, DATE_FORMAT(er.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, FROM eval_response er JOIN employee e1 ON er.eval_id = e1.emp_id JOIN employee e2 ON er.target_id = e2.emp_id JOIN eval_form ef ON er.form_id = ef.form_id JOIN eval_round r ON er.round_id = r.round_id JOIN eval_type et ON ef.type_id = et.type_id WHERE et.name = 'PEER' AND e1.emp_no = #{evalNo} AND e2.emp_no = #{targetNo} AND er.form_id = #{formId} AND r.round_no = #{roundNo} ORDER BY er.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT er.result_id AS resultId, e1.emp_no AS evalNo, e1.name AS evalName, e2.emp_no AS targetNo, e2.name AS targetName, ef.name AS formName, r.round_no AS roundNo, er.score AS score, er.reason AS reason, DATE_FORMAT(er.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createdAt, FROM eval_response er JOIN employee e1 ON er.eval_id = e1.emp_id JOIN employee e2 ON er.target_id = e2.emp_id JOIN eval_form ef ON er.form_id = ef.form_id JOIN eval_round r ON er.round_id = r.round_id WHERE er.result_id = #{resultId}
SELECT ep.name AS propertyName, es.score AS score FROM eval_score es JOIN eval_property ep ON ep.property_id = es.property_id WHERE es.result_id = #{resultId}
